ygData.subject: Re: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/26/99 1:52:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time, Clanretri@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/26/99 1:52:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Clanretri@... writes:

<<
homeworld - same o real time strategy but just in 3d. you build, you get a
load of little ships, you kill. and the cycle continues till you beat the
mission. BORING
>>

Your ignorance shines. That is like saying - "Everquest - same ol RPing game
but just in 3d. you hunt, you kill, you gain a lvl, and the cycle continues
till your high enough lvl to camp the great items. BORING"

you can apply your simplistic view incorrectly to any game to sound pithy,
but you are wrong as was my sarcastic analogy using EQ. I'm no big fan of
C&C games or Starcraft - I like truly immersive, original, and meticulously
designed games - Homeworld is a great game - EQ is as well. I guarantee
anyone who tries Homeworld will be astounded with what the folks at Relic
games have accomplished. It is sooooo much more than the typical harvest and
build RTS. The story and music alone set it apart. Only three games have
captured my attention totally and completely in the last 2 years:

Myth: The Fallen Lords
EverQuest
Homeworld

Wizaro Wrathcaster
Solusek Ro

"If lvl 29 isn't a hell lvl I can't imagine 30"
